org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.env.internal
 
  • Classes in org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.env.internal used by org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.env.internal
    Class
    Description
    AbstractLobCreator
    Convenient base class for proxy-based LobCreator for handling wrapping.
    BlobAndClobCreator
    LobCreator which can use Connection.createBlob() and Connection.createClob(), but NClob references are created locally.
    DefaultSchemaNameResolver
    Default implementation of SchemaNameResolver using Connection.getSchema().
    ExtractedDatabaseMetaDataImpl
    Standard implementation of ExtractedDatabaseMetaData
    ExtractedDatabaseMetaDataImpl.Builder
     
    JdbcEnvironmentImpl
     
    JdbcEnvironmentInitiator
     
    LobCreationLogging
     
    LobCreatorBuilderImpl
    Builds LobCreator instances based on the capabilities of the environment.
    LobTypes
    Enumeration of the JDBC LOB locator types
    NonContextualLobCreator
    LobCreator implementation using non-contextual or local creation, meaning that we generate the LOB references ourselves as opposed to delegating to the JDBC connection.
